 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְוֶר‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==structure (colonnade ?) attached to west side of Solomon's temple==; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְוָרִים‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.11|2Kgs 23:11]] apparently same word in singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְבָּר‎</span> [[1Chr.26.18|1Chr 26:18]] (twice in verse) (all with article) ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] compare Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***open kiosk, summer-house*** (literally ***light-bearer***). whence perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> as loan-word, compare Mishna <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְוָוד‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְוָאר‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְוָורָא‎</span> ***suburd*** (made up of ***villas, summer-houses*** [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> then post-exilic insertion in [[2Kgs.23.11|2Kgs 23:11]] compare further [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] in Hastings<sup>DB</sup>).
